page.title: 13PUBLIC EVENTS
page.content:
The army opens Minley Manor (see HISTORY) to the public for two events each year. One of these is the {Extravaganza,}held in early June. This is a floodlighted military spectacle involving drama and music. The other event, held around the same time of the year, is the{Fete.}In 1985 the Fete included gymnastic and freefall parachuting displays. Both the Fete and Extravaganza are organised by the Royal Engineers.
The Yateley Morris Men sometimes perform at the Crown & Cushion Inn on Minley Road (see INNS).
